full_text:
IN THE COURT OF JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE OF THE FIRST CLASS- ITI
THIRUVANANTHAPURAM
Present: Sri. Vinod Babu M.U
Judicial Magistrate of the First Class-III
18" day of February, 2025
CG. 485/2021
Complainant : State represented by the Sub Inspector of Police, City
Traffic Police Station ( Crime 6785/17).
(By Asst. Public Prosecutor)
Accused : Ratheeshkumar, aged 34 years, S/o Pushpakaran,
Roadarikathu veedu, Asarivilakom, Perekkonam desom,
Vazhichal ward, Ottasekharamangalam village.
Offences : U/s. 279,337 and 338 of Indian Penal Code.
Order : Accused is convicted and sentenced to pay a fine of
Rs. 1,500/- for the offence U/Ss. 279,337 and 338 of
Indian Penal Code. In default of payment of fine the
accused shall undergo simple imprisonment for 10 days.
Heard, perused the records and passed the following:
JUDGMENT
1. The accused stands charge sheeted by the Sub Inspector of Police, City Traffic
Police Station alleging offence U/Ss. 279,337 and 338 of Indian Penal Code.
2. Accused pleaded guilty . Particulars of offence U/Ss. 279,337 and 338 of Indian
Penal Code was read over and explained to the accused and he pleaded guilty .
This court is convinced that the plea of the accused is voluntary. Hence his plea is
accepted. The accused is found guilty for the offence U/S. 279,337 and 338 of

2
Indian Penal Code and he is convicted thereunder.

3. Accused is convicted and sentenced to pay a fine of Rs. 1,500/- for the
offence U/S.279,337 and 338 of Indian Penal Code. In default of payment
of fine the accused shall undergo simple imprisonment for 10 days.

(Dictated to the Confidential Assistant, transcribed and typed by her, corrected and
pronounced by me, in open court, on this the 18" day of February, 2025.)

Judicial Magistrate of the First Class- ITI

Thiruvananthapuram
